timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: This class doesn't have a @NonNullByDefault so are you sure that removing @NonNull here is safe?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Yes, I am. But it should not be to hard to add it on class level if you prefer.
replies.author: cweitkamp
